Package items

Class Cannon

java.lang.Object
items.Item
items.Upgrade
items.Cannon
public class Cannon
extends Upgrade
Cannons are upgrade items, used to increase combat rolls. A trade-off: The more cannons you have, the easier it is to repeal pirates, but they take up cargo space.
Author:
Andrew Hall
